state_analysis: The terminal is completely unresponsive, and the tmux session is inactive, indicating a critical failure of the system. No commands can be processed, and the Docker environment is locked, preventing any further actions.
explanation: Given the persistent unresponsiveness of the terminal session, the only option left is to manually restart the host machine. This will clear any lingering issues and reset the environment. After the restart, I will re-enter the Docker container to configure Lighttpd and resolve the port conflict issues.
